content: the heel the round flap border k9 10 11 until the round 3 k until the end of the round marker slipping the stitch markers as you you should have 76 86 96 sts on the come to them needles repeat round 2-3 until you have a round 1 k23 26 29 pm k1 work total of 32 sts next round of chart k1 pm k23 26 repeat round 2 four more times until 29 you have a total of 16 sts  decrease rounds remove the stitch markers on the round 1 k until the last 3 sts before last repeat remove the bm and k4 the next marker k2tog k1 sm k1 you should have 8 sts on each work the next round of chart k1 sm needle k1 ssk k until the end of the round 5 | urederra socks to finish repeat all instruction for the second sock block your socks and leaves to user kitchener stitch to grap toes dry completely together weave in all end and thim charted instruction 6 | urederra socks enjoy your new socks i hope you enjoyed knitting these socks i encourage you to share pictures of your project both on instagram and ravelry i would love seeing your version of the urederra socks you can use the hashtag #urederrasocks so i can see them if you have any doubt you can contact me at raquelisknitting@gmail com you can find me on instagram and ravelry as @raquelisknitting you can find all my patterns in ravelry https //www ravewsy com/designers/raquel-perez
